mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, IDX, BOARD_NAME, BOARD_CODE, BAORD_TYPE, URL, IS_DELETE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, IS_OPEN, IS_REPLY, IS_COMMENT, EDITER, IS_FILE, FILE_CNT, IS_READONLY, IS_VIEWCNT, IS_LOCK, IS_NOTICE, IS_DEL from (select * from board_config order by idx)) where rnum >= #{startrow} and rnum <= #{endrow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_config ( IDX,BOARD_CODE,CATEGORYS,TITLE,WRITER,PASSWD, EMAIL,CONTENT,REMOTE_ADDR,IS_NOTICE, MEMBER_SEQ ,URL,SEQ) VALUES ( baord_seq.nextval , #{board_code} , #{categorys}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{passwd} , #{email}, #{content} , #{remote_addr}, #{is_notice}, #{member_seq}, #{url} ,baord_seq.CURRVAL )

INSERT INTO board_config ( IDX,BOARD_CODE,CATEGORYS,TITLE,WRITER,PASSWD, EMAIL,CONTENT,REMOTE_ADDR,IS_NOTICE, MEMBER_SEQ ,URL,SEQ,LEVELS,STEP) VALUES ( baord_seq.nextval , #{board_code} , #{categorys}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{passwd} , #{email}, #{content} , #{remote_addr}, #{is_notice}, #{member_seq}, #{url},#{seq},#{levels}+1,#{step}+1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE board_config SET CATEGORYS = #{categorys}, TITLE = #{title}, WRITER = #{writer}, EMAIL = #{email}, CONTENT = #{content}, REMOTE_ADDR = #{remote_addr}, UPDATE_TIME = sysdate, IS_NOTICE = #{is_notice}, URL = #{url} WHERE idx=#{idx}
update board_config set step=#{step} +1 where seq=#{seq} and step > #{step}
